item.title: Errrg alittle help here?
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-spear = ", 0, 18); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.vSpearLeft), 0, Integer.toString(p.vSpearLeft).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-cGar = ", 0, 18); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.cGarLeft), 0, Integer.toString(p.cGarLeft).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-chainbody = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.vTopLeft), 0, Integer.toString(p.vTopLeft).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-chainskirt = ", 0, 23); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.vLegsLeft), 0, Integer.toString(p.vLegsLeft).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Read full topic
